source: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_SEQ_00<tab>Heustienne is ready for her first lesson, and Ser Alberic would direct your steps to her.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_SEQ_00<tab>アドネール占星台のアルベリクは、ウスティエヌの身を案じているようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_SEQ_01<tab>Ser Alberic informs you that Heustienne is ready for her first lesson. Having offered you some words of advice, he bids you go to the western highlands of Coerthas. You will find your pupil near the Pike, testing her lancework against dragons.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_SEQ_01<tab>アルベリクから依頼を受けて、ウスティエヌの稽古をつけることになった。クルザス西部高地のハルドラス像付近にいる「ウスティエヌ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_SEQ_02<tab>You arrive to find Heustienne overwhelmed by dragons. Having dispatched the creatures and secured the area, return your attention to your pupil.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_SEQ_02<tab>倒れていたウスティエヌを襲う敵を倒した。ハルドラス像付近にいる「ウスティエヌ」を救助しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_SEQ_03<tab>Heustienne thanks you for your timely arrival, and explains that her predicament was the result of an unsuccessful attempt to mimic your unique style. In order to avoid a recurrence, do as your pupil bids and give her a formal demonstration of your abilities. Follow her to the area west of the Black Iron Bridge, and lie in wait for dragons. When the creatures appear, strike them down with your sublime lancework.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_SEQ_03<tab>ウスティエヌを救助したところ、彼女に手本を見せてほしいと依頼された。クルザス西部高地のブラックアイアン・ブリッジ西方の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9CA601 /var>」であたりを見渡し、現れた竜の眷属を討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_SEQ_04<tab>You have demonstrated your transcendent abilities to Heustienne, who appears at once impressed and perplexed. Ask her what she thinks of your display.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_SEQ_04<tab>現れた竜の眷属を討伐し、ウスティエヌに手本を見せた。ブラックアイアン・ブリッジ西方の「ウスティエヌ」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_SEQ_05Heustienne struggles to see how your lancework differs from her own. Though you are unable to answer her questions, in your earnest attempt to do so, you experience an epiphany which inspires you to create a new technique.

※The next dragoon quest is available from Heustienne to the northwest of the Black Iron Bridge.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_SEQ_05<tab>ウスティエヌと話した。竜騎士としての戦い方を説明するために、自分自身を見つめなおしたところ、新たな技を見出した。ウスティエヌにも説明してあげよう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Heustienne near the Pike.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_TODO_00<tab>ハルドラス像付近のウスティエヌと合流

source: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_TODO_02<tab>Lie in wait at the specified location and defeat any enemies that appear.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_TODO_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9CA601 /var>で見渡して現れた竜の眷属を討伐

source: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_ALBERIC_000_000<tab>Greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You look very much a teacher today. That is well, for Heustienne is eager for her first lesson.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_ALBERIC_000_000)) (( )) 02 /var>、心身の準備が整ったようだな？
師となり教えることで、
竜騎士としての新たな一面を垣間見ることもできよう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_ALBERIC_000_001<tab>Now, though you agreed to accept her as your pupil, I suspect that you are not without reservation. You worry whether you will be equal to the task. Well, worry not─I have every confidence that you will make a fine mentor.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_ALBERIC_000_001とはいえ、焦らず取り組むことだ。
彼女も一角の騎士なればこそ、プライドもあろう。
長年、染みついた戦い方を変えるのは難しいだろうからな。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_ALBERIC_000_002<tab>Were I to offer you advice, however, it would be to have patience. Though Heustienne is a master of her art, it is all she has ever known. As such, it may prove a challenge for her to adapt. And like all of us, she is not without pride, and there will be times when tact is required.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_ALBERIC_000_002さあ早速、「ウスティエヌ」に稽古をつけてやってくれ。
彼女なら、クルザス西部高地の「ハルドラス像」付近にて、
鍛錬がてらに竜の眷属を狩っているはずだ。

source:
TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_ALBERIC_000_003I must also mention that Heustienne is zealous to a fault. I worry that she will overexert herself in her pursuit of strength.
...But I am keeping you from your lesson. Heustienne left word that she would be in the western highlands, testing her lance against dragon spawn. Seek her out near the Pike.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_ALBERIC_000_003彼女は根を詰めすぎる性分ゆえ、
無理をしないかと、いささか心配だ……。
よろしく頼んだぞ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_ALBERIC_000_005<tab>Heustienne has gone to the western highlands of Coerthas. Seek her out near the Pike.
target: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_ALBERIC_000_005<tab>さあ早速、ウスティエヌに稽古をつけてやってくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_HEUSTIENNE_000_007<tab><pant> There are too many... L-Look out!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_HEUSTIENNE_000_007ここで己の技を磨いていたが……
数が多い……くっ、まだ敵が来る！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_HEUSTIENNE_000_010<tab>I owe you a debt of gratitude. <sigh> Our lessons have not even begun, and already you have seen me on my knees... I had been trying to match what lancework of yours I'd seen, but without success. That was how the dragons managed to overwhelm me.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_HEUSTIENNE_000_010ありがとう……見苦しいところを見せてしまったな。
先日見た、君の槍さばきの再現を試みたのだが……
見よう見まねでは真髄に迫れず、少々しくじってしまった。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_HEUSTIENNE_000_011<tab>Had I but fallen back on my tried and trusted techniques, I would have made short work of their ilk. But what would I have learned, then? Nay, what I know is no longer enough.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_HEUSTIENNE_000_011……確かに、私が磨いてきた技だけを使えば、
この程度の眷属に後れを取ることなどないが、それではダメだ。
君の戦い方を会得し、より強くならねば……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_HEUSTIENNE_000_012<tab>The war exacts a heavy toll on us all, but none more so than we dragoons. If we are to survive, we must grow stronger─<var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> must grow stronger!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_HEUSTIENNE_000_012厳しい戦いが続く中、「竜騎士団」も、
ひとり、またひとりと人材を失い、損耗してきている。
……ゆえに私が強くなり、犠牲を減らさねばならんのだ！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_HEUSTIENNE_000_013<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, will you demonstrate your techniques to me? I would study your movements up close.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_HEUSTIENNE_000_013)) (( )) 02 /var>……どうか今一度、
君が戦う姿を見せてもらえぬだろうか？
その槍さばきの真髄を、何としても掴みたいのだ……！

source: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_HEUSTIENNE_000_014<tab>...Aye, I suppose you have the right of it. There is no substitute for live foes. Come with me, then─there is a suitable place west of the Black Iron Bridge.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_HEUSTIENNE_000_014……ありがとう、恩に着るぞ。
ブラックアイアン・ブリッジの西方でも、敵が目撃されている。
そこで、ドラゴン族を待ち受け、討ち取ってみせてほしい。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_HEUSTIENNE_000_019<tab>This is the spot. Lie in wait long enough, and dragons will surely appear.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_HEUSTIENNE_000_019この辺りで周囲を見渡していれば、
我らの気配を感じ取り、竜の眷属が現れるだろう……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_HEUSTIENNE_000_020<tab>Hmmm... The techniques you employ differ not from mine, yet you overcome the enemy with such ease...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_HEUSTIENNE_000_020ううむ……扱う技は、私のそれと変わらないようだ。
だが、君の力は眷属どもを圧倒し、易々とねじ伏せた。
その強さの本質を、掴めそうで掴めない……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_HEUSTIENNE_000_022<tab>What is it that separates us so? What is it that you are doing that I am not?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_HEUSTIENNE_000_022私と君との戦い方で決定的に違うものとは、いったい……？
何か思い当たることはないだろうか？
どんな些細なことでもいいから、教えてほしい！

TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_HEUSTIENNE_000_023そんな……
私との差は思い当たらないだって……？

source: TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_HEUSTIENNE_000_024<tab>You see no difference between our lancework, but in the course of considering this, you conceived a new technique!?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRG520_01690_HEUSTIENNE_000_024……指導のために、己の戦い方を見つめ直すことで、
君は新たな技の切っ掛けを掴んだというのか！？
なら、私と君との違いはどこに……。
